meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of cities or towns.
meanings.sent1: The urbanistic skyline was filled with tall buildings and bustling streets.
meanings.sent2: She loved the urbanistic vibe of the downtown area with its cafes and shops.
meanings.sent3: The urbanistic pigeons seemed to have their own favorite spots in the city.
meanings.sent4: His artwork captured the essence of urbanistic life in a colorful and vibrant way.
meanings.sent5: The urbanistic sounds of traffic and chatter created a lively atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The study or practice of city planning and development.
meanings.sent1: She decided to pursue a career in urbanistic to help improve city infrastructure.
meanings.sent2: The urbanistic of the city involved analyzing traffic patterns and green spaces.
meanings.sent3: The urbanistic presented their innovative ideas for sustainable urban development.
